mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BOARD_ID, EMP_NO, TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(BOARD_ID),0) +1 FROM BOARD), #{empNo}, #{title}, #{boardContents})
mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NAME, B.* FROM BOARD B, EMPLOYEES E WHERE B.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC
SELECT E.EMP_NAME, B.* FROM BOARD B join EMPLOYEES E on B.emp_no = E.emp_no WHERE B.board_id = #{boardId}

SELECT ROW_NUM, BOARD_ID, EMP_NAME, TITLE, BOARD_CONTENTS, TIME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM ROW_NUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT E.EMP_NAME, B.* FROM BOARD B, EMPLOYEES E WHERE B.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC) A ) C WHERE ROW_NUM BETWEEN #{first} AND #{last}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD
AND TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
AND BOARD_CONTENTS LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
